name: On merge to master
  pull:
    branches:
      - master
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
        with:
          ref: ${{ github.head_ref }}
      - uses: butlerlogic/action-autotag@stable
        with:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: "${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}"
          strategy: package
          tag_prefix: "v"
